channel.title: Shuffle;
channel.description:
[b]Shuffle[/b] Possibly not one of your things, maybe you think its gay. Please keep your rants to yourself.
So, how many people have heard of "Melbourne shuffle" or "Hard style Shuffle". I bet not a lot of people around this forum know how to do it, but how many of you would like to learn how to do it or just like watching others do it.
To day. I have been practising the Melbourne shuffle for just over 6 months, I'm the only one at my school who is able to do it, and I have quite a lot of attention as a lot of people like "Rave" and "Hardstyle" music.
So; If you haven't seen "Hardstyle Shuffle" here it is: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9QJGb-jYQ4g

item.title: Shuffle;
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Fission, post:18, topic:316994”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=413557.msg3046444#msg3046444 date=1259489700]

I thought you had cancer o_O

And? Doesn’t mean I’m on my death bed.

If you do have cancer, you must be fit.

Little known fact, but dancing makes your lifespan long, and actually is a good work out.

Famous NFL receivers did intense dancing as workouts, even ballet, and it helped them.

Some dance style can help you improve your stamina, balance, coordination, sex life, sex, sex other stuff, get hot girls, more stuff. cool video though.
[/quote]

Definetly. I think I could dance, I am just to… I lack the confidence to bust a move out on the floor infront of everybody T_T
I’ll stick to treadmil/outdoor running :D[/quote]

Dancing can help with your confidence and also get you tons of hot girls o.O and sex mostly sex.

Read full topic
